data.text: Maa nei bolo Dimaadua digi huli mai i tadau baahi?
Maa nei bolo Dimaadua digi huli mai i tadau baahi
gei digaula gaa holo mouli gidaadou
gei gidaadou ga daahee gi daha i di mmidi o di monowai,
Nia wai mmidi gu haga maalemu gidaadou!
Gidaadou e hai tadau danggee gi Dimaadua
Gidaadou guu too gi daha, gadoo be di manu mamaangi ne doo gi daha
Tadau hagamaamaa le e hanimoi i baahi o Dimaadua
